Actions.Name: List the user's teams [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation lists all teams that the user is a member of.

Actions.Name: Get current account [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: Get the account of the current logged in user.

Actions.Name: Get a team member by ID [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation gets a member of a team by their unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get Schedule details [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a Schedule's details instead.
This operation returns details of a schedule using the schedule's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get Shift [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a Shift instead.
This operation returns details for a shift using the shift's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get Shift Request details [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation returns details for a shift request using the request's unique ID.

Actions.Name: Get team details [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Get a team instead.
This operation returns details for a team using the team's unique ID.

Actions.Name: List all members in a team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation lists all the members of a given team.

Actions.Name: Get shift requests [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use List all Time Off Reasons instead.
This operation returns all shift requests for a team using the team's unique ID.

Actions.Name: List all team shifts [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use List all Shifts instead.
This operation returns all shifts assigned to members of a team

Actions.Name: List all groups in a team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use List all Scheduling Groups instead.
This operation lists all groups within a team.

Actions.Name: Get Time Off Reasons [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use List all Time Off Reasons instead.
This operation returns the list of time off reasons associated with a team.

Actions.Name: When a new member is added to the team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new member is added to the team.

Actions.Name: When a member is deleted from the team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a member is deleted from the team.

Actions.Name: When a member is updated in the team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a team member is updated.

Actions.Name: When a schedule is published for the team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a schedule is published for the team.

Actions.Name: When a new shift is added to the team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new shift is added to a member of a team.

Actions.Name: When a shift is deleted in a team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a shift is deleted for a member of a team.

Actions.Name: When a new shift request is created [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a new swap, offer or time off shift request is created.

Actions.Name: When a shift request is deleted [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a swap, offer or time off shift request is deleted.

Actions.Name: When a shift request is updated [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a swap, offer or time off shift request is updated.

Actions.Name: When a shift is updated in a team [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description: This operation triggers when a shift is updated for a member of a team.

Actions.Name: Approve a shift swap or hand off request (managers only) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Approve a Swap Shifts request instead.
This operation allows managers to approve a shift swap or hand off request.

Actions.Name: Approve or deny a time off request (managers only) [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Approve a Time Off request instead.
This operation allows managers to approve or deny a time off request.
